description: Advanced AI artwork creation platform for artists that understands your style, creates inspiring images and streamlines your creative process
title: Exactly.ai
introduction: exactly.ai is a platform that helps creators perfect their images, sell their work, and control their intellectual property. It allows users to train a personal AI on their artwork, maintain ownership and control of everything, and develop multiple concepts.
features: Generate images using models created by the worldâ€™s greatest illustrators.
Train a personal AI on artwork and make images in your style in seconds.
Sell access to AI models to clients for simplified collaboration and revisions.
Explore alternative concepts and generate multiple versions of ideas.
Share and annotate sketches for real-time exploration.
Retain ownership and control of every image and AI model created.

faqs.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: Go to the Manage My Subscription section in your user profile or contact support via chat or email at support@exactly.ai.

faqs.question: How can I get a refund?
faqs.answer: Contact support via chat or email at support@exactly.ai for assistance with refunds.

faqs.question: Where do I send my feedback?
faqs.answer: You can send your feedback through the support chat in the app or contact support via email at support@exactly.ai.
